WorkItem.Description:
In Excel there exists single and double underline in an accounting variant. These are drawn below the decimal separators.
 
Check class constants:
 
* PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_DOUBLE
* PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_DOUBLEACCOUNTING
* PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_NONE
* PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_SINGLE
* PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_SINGLEACCOUNTING
 
In PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5, the normal single and double underline works fine, but not the accounting variants. They come out as the ordinary variant.
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (1.6.4+)
WorkItem.Summary: Missing support for accounting underline types in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

Comments.Message: Attaching plain read/write test from xls -> xls, xlsx before and after fix.
